inn1.comm: good start, back of a length outside off stump, no movement, Nazir gets back and across and pushes to cover
first runs for Pakistan as Nazir pushes forward to a full delivery outside off stump and squeezes one backward of point
and he's beaten first ball, pushing forward to a good length delivery outside off and missing the line completely
full delivery, delivered from close to the stumps, but it slips down the pads after pitching outside the line, clips Akmal's front leg and they all go up in appeal ... the ball is keeping low here

cleaned up! Akmal stands deep in his crease and can't cope with the low bounce, the ball pitching marginally outside off stump and keeping very low, beating the toe end of his bat and crashing into middle stump
good length delivery just outside off stump, Younis gets the front leg forward and tickles it to the leg side, and Nazir is quick to call for the sharp single
good start, Ntini running in from wide of the crease and pitching on a good length, Younis shuffles and taps it to leg and Ntini runs across
back of a length outside off stump, decent bounce this time, Younis gets across and dabs it to point but doesnt chance Gibbs' arm
a fuller length on off stump, Younis comes forward and drives to midwicket, almost falling over as he does so and there's no chance of a run
good length, he comes forward and defends to cover
sharp bounce this time, forcing Younis up onto the toes and he does well to keep the ball down and into the gap at gully
back of a length outside off stump, tidy line, Nazir gets behind it and defends
good length delivery outside off stump, Younis gets a full stride forward, bat and pad together, and defends to point
a bit low again, just on off stump, Younis gets forward and adjusts to the bounce, keeping it out to point
back of a length outside off stump, Younis gets forward to judge the carry and then decides to leave it alone for Boucher
much fuller this time, pitching on off stump as Pollock looks to get some swing, Younis gets forward and drives to cover
full delivery again, he gets forward and drives to cover
back of a length outside off stump, he gets forward and defends
good length delivery outside off stump, Nazir thinks about a drive but quickly and defends watchfully
back of a length, a touch of movement into Nazir, who gets bat on it and inside-edges it towards square leg
back of a length, Younis shuffles across to off stump quickly and dabs it to backward point, a bit of hesitation as de Villiers swoops in but they run the single
good length delivery, he gets forward and pushes to the fielders
back of a length on middle and off, surprises him but he does well to get back and keep the ball down into the leg side
poor delivery, pitching well down leg stump and missing the bat and keeper to run away for five wides
back of a length, pitching on middle and leg and swinging down, Nazir tries the flick but gets beaten and takes it high on the pad
back of a length, played to de Villiers at backward point
good length delivery, smack on the money and all Younis can do is come onto the front foot and defend it back to Pollock
good length again, Younis comes forward and defends but the ball snicks along the ground down to third man
tight line, off stump, no room to work with and Nazir defends to point
there's that impeccable line and length again, in the corridor just outside off, Nazir again gets forward and defends
identical delivery from Pollock, Nazir comes onto the front foot and can only defend to de Villiers at point this time
another wide from Ntini, pitching too full and down leg stump
back of a length outside off, enough room for Younis to steer that in the gap behind gully and down to Morkel at third man for a single
back of a length again, Nazir stands tall and tries to drive off the back foot but the ball takes the toe end of the bat and drops into the ground

thats that! Ntini bowls it short on off stump, getting extra bounce this time and a bit  faster than the last ball, and that does it for Nazir, who swivels on one foot and tamely pulls it into the hands of Botha at square leg
back of a length outside off stump, Yousuf shoulders arms
full on middle and leg, allowing Yousuf to get off  the mark with a classy clip off the pads out to deep backward square leg for a double
back of a length on off stump, Yousuf turns it to Botha at square leg
good length on about off stump, stays low but Younis tucks it around the corner and calls for the single as square leg moves across to field
back of a length outside off stump, left alone this time by Yousuf
again back of a length, no movement, Yousuf comes forward and leaves
tight delivery, straighter and closer to the stumps, Yousuf defends it back
good length on off stump, Yousuf falls over as he taps it to midwicket
back of a length outside off, Yousuf gets behind the line nicely and defends off the back foot to point
good length outside off stump, pushed to point and de Villiers swoops in
fuller delivery outside off, Younis comes forward and pushes to point again
good length again, Ntini running in from wide of the crease and looking for movement, but there's not much as Younis hurriedly comes forward and defends to de Villiers once again
tidy delivery, good length outside off stump and Younis quickly defends with a good stride forward to negate the movement
short delivery on the stumps, Younis is hurried into his shot and works it off the hips uneasily, luckily for him its timed so well that it flies over midwicket
but thats a better shot! Ntini overpitched on the pads and Younis flicks superbly over mid-on and midwicket for four more
back of a length outside off, no pace and a bit low, there's room on offer but Yousuf mistimes the chop into the ground in front of de Villiers at point
good length on middle and off, Yousuf taps it in front of midwicket with soft hands and Younis responds well to his call for one
back of a length, Younis gets up and steers it off the back foot into the gap behind de Villiers at point for another single out to the sweeper
back of a length on middle and off, Yousuf shuffles and tucks it to the fielder at midwicket, no chance of a run this time
shorter delivery on middle and leg, Yousuf gets up and works it nicely into the gap behind square leg and down to Ntini at fine leg for one
better delivery, good length just outside off stump, Younis comes forward and taps it to point and then looks up at Yousuf, but he sends him back
back of a length outside off, he comes forward and defends to extra cover
good length outside off, steered to backward point where de Villiers is sharp, diving to his left and saving runs
fuller delivery, he comes forward and drives nicely but cant beat Gibbs in the covers
short of a length on off stump, he tucks it to square leg
straighter delivery on off stump, Yousuf plays it back to Ntini
shot! Short of a length, width on offer, and Yousuf uses the pace to get back and crack that through the covers for four ... not a fielder moved
back of a length on off stump, Younis gets behind the line and defends
good length just outside off stump, he goes for the square-drive but gets an inside-edge back past leg stump for one
back of a length outside off stump, slower ball stops on Yousuf as he plays it back towards Pollock, safely
good length outside off but Yousuf comes forward and pushes on the up between the covers for four
back of a length on off stump, forcing him up to defend it back to Pollock
slower delivery, full on off stump and Yousuf, initially shuffling across his stumps, has to defend it back to Pollock, just checking his shot
full delivery outside off, Younis kneels down and drives but cant beat point
back of a length outside off, Younis comes onto the front foot and pushes at the ball, french-cutting down to short fine leg and running the single
sweet! Yousuf sees the shorter delivery and gets back, punching well off the back foot with great balance, and on the up, past extra cover for four
beaten! Ntini bowls a good length and gets it to hold its line to beat Yousuf as he feels for it off the front foot, good comeback from the bowler
back of a length on off stump, Yousuf shuffles and taps it into the gap at square leg and calls for the easy single
overpitched outside off stump and Younis cashes in, coming forward and driving nicely into that same gap at extra cover for four
back of a length outside off, Yousuf gets back and pushes back to Pollock
strays onto leg stump and Yousuf tucks it towards square leg for one
tight line and length, no room to work with on off stump and Younis defends
slower delivery, Pollock rolling his fingers over the cutter, Younis comes well forward outside off stump and tries to tap it away but doesnt time it well
short and wide, Younis is a little cramped for room but cuts hard into the ground in front of de Villiers at backward point
back of a length outside off, Younis gets back quickly and drives off the back foot but straight to Gibbs in the covers
good start, a good length on off stump and Yousuf defends to cover
overpitched outside off stump but Yousuf can only drive to extra cover
overpitched again, Yousuf comes forward and drives to Smith at mid-off, calling for the risky single and getting it as Younis responds well
good length outside off stump, Younis gets well across and opens the face of the bat, squeezing it through the gap at gully for one down to third man
good length on off stump, Yousuf comes forward and flicks to Ntini at mid-on for the single which raises Pakistan's 50 in the 14th over
full outside off stump, Younis gets to it and drives on the up but cant beat Smith at mid-off this time
starts off with a loosener well outside off stump, which Yousuf steers down to third man for one
back of a length outside off stump, Younis stands and runs it to third man
short ball on off stump, cramps Yousuf for room as it comes on hurriedly, he doesnt time it well as he swivels but does pick the gap between square leg and midwicket
overpitched outside off stump, Younis uses the feet well and drives hard to Smith at mid-off, who's a bit deep, and calls for the run
full outside off, Yousuf drives to mid-off but Smith anticipates and moves in
fullish length again, Yousuf gets the front foot out and pushes with too much bottomhand, but calls for the run to extra cover
good length outside off, he comes forward and runs it to square gully, where Kallis hurries across and fields
full length outside off stump, he comes forward and drives to Smith at mid-off, calling for the easy single
slower ball on off stump, Younis walks across and flicks uppishly into the gap at mid-on and immediately calls for two, good call and good running
wide delivery down the pads, Boucher moves to his left and fields
slower delivery, back of a length outside off, he taps it point where de Villiers runs in and misfields, over-running the ball, and allowing them to cross for one
back of a length outside off, a hint of movement away does enough to beat Yousuf as he pushes for it
overpitched outside off stump, he drives but straight to cover
back of a length on off, pushed to point softly and he calls for the run immediately, its placed well and both batsmen are quick off the blocks
comes in Yousuf off a length and he calmly touches it wide of backward point for another smart single
fuller delivery, Younis gets a huge stride forward and defends into the covers, Yousuf calls for the run and again they do very well and thats the 50 partnership
good length on off stump, worked straight to Kemp at midwicket
full on leg stump, flicked out to deep midwicket for one more
good length outside off stump, he gets back and defends to cover
good length on middle and leg, nicely flicked by Yousuf into the gap, 'Aaja, aaja!' is the call
back of a length outside off, steered well backward of point for one
short delivery well outside off, Younis reaches out and uppishly steers it down to third man for one more to keep the runs ticking over
length ball on middle and off, Yousuf shuffles and tucks it into the gap behind square leg for another easy single
back of a length on off, extra bounce, Younis wanted to work it fine but had to hop up and play it back down the track to the bowler
slower ball, fuller on middle and leg, Younis is into his on-drive early and plays it in the air towards mid-on, who happens to be deep so he gets one
short of a length outside off, Younis hops up and keeps it down to point for a sharp single
this one moves back off the length and beats Yousuf, standing leaden-footed and trying to steer it down to third man, beaten by the bounce
now its overpitched on middle and leg and Yousuf clips it in the air over square leg and Botha does the diving stop on the boundary, good shot, good stop

oh whats this now? Chaos, as Yousuf defends a full ball to midwicket, starts off and then stops, selling his partner Younis down the river as he's way down in response to Yousuf's call, only to see him stop and go back but by the time Younis turns and heads back the ball is already into the bowler's hands, and he whips off the bails
good length outside off stump, he comes forward and drives to point
short delivery outside off, comes on to Yousuf, who opens the face and tries to deliberately run it fine but its taken by Boucher, on the bounce
back of a length on middle and leg, Maliks gets deep in his crease and tucks it off the pads past square leg to get off the mark first ball
back of a length outside off, Yousuf steers it through gully for one
beaten! Malik doesnt move his feet as he fishes for a back of a length delivery outside off stump ... nervous start for him!
back of a length outside off, Malik gets back and pushes through the covers out to sweeper for a single
slower delivery outside off stump, stops on Yousuf as he drives to cover
another slow ball, full outside off stump, Yousuf uses the feet and pushes towards mid-off, calling for the single which will get him back on strike
tossed up from around the stumps, middle and leg, tucked to midwicket for one
tossed up fuller, middle and off, Malik comes forward and defends
quicker and flatter, leg stump, driven to mid-on and theres another mix-up
maximum! Malik dances down the track, slamming across the line and just managing to clear Morkel at wide long-on, risky shot but he timed it decently
straighter delivery, flatter trajectory, Malik goes back and plays it back to Botha
full and flat, Malik drives to the right of Botha, who collects and flings it back to Boucher
short delivery outside off, very wide too, Yousuf gets up on the toes and slaps it wide of a diving de Villiers at backward point, beats third man too
fuller ball on middle and leg, tucked into the gap at square leg and Kemp fields
good length on off stump, Malik comes forward hesitantly and defends it
middle and leg this time and Malik turns it into the gap at midwicket for two
slower ball, full outside off and Malik drives to Gibbs at short cover
slow again but its wide of off stump, allowing Malik room to steer to third man
tossed up on leg stump from around the stumps again, flicked out to deep midwicket by Malik
flighted on middle and leg, Yousuf plays in front of his front pad but cant place it into the gaps
tossed up on middle and leg again, worked to Gibbs at short fine leg
gives it some air this time, on middle and off, Malik uses the feet and drives out to long-off
flatter on leg stump, tucked straight to short fine leg, where Gibbs fields
deft touch! Botha tosses it up on middle and leg and Yousuf flicks it very well, beating Gibbs at short fine leg and the ball runs away
back of a length outside off, Malik drops the wrists and runs it down to Pollock at third man, raising the 100 for Pakistan, which is well appreciated by the Lahore crowd
full outside off, Yousuf reaches out and square-drives to de Villiers at backward point
slower ball, the cutter from Kallis, Yousuf waits and opens the face of the bat, running it down towards Pollock
another gentle off-cutter outside off, a bit wide, Malik reaches out and guides it down to Pollock once again
back of a length, Yousuf chops it to de Villiers at backward point
slower ball, good length on off stump, Yousuf rolls the wrists and works it into the gap at square leg for a single to end the over
tossed up on middle and off, Yousuf waits on it and then flicks into the midwicket gap, calling and running hard for the second
tossed up on off again, he rolls the wrists but cant beat the fielder
tossed up again, Yousuf tries to work it fine but gets a leading edge which rolls back to Botha
more middle and leg this time, he turns it but cant beat Gibbs at short fine leg
more air on off stump, driven to cover, Yousuf still on 49
but there's the 50 as Yousuf flicks into the gap at square leg ... well played
full outside off stump, driven into the gap and thats two more out to deep cover
back of a length outside off stump, slower ball, patiently steered to third man
back of a length on off stump, worked via the inside-edge to midwicket for one
back of a length on off stump, Yousuf shuffles and drives past mid-on, excellently calling for two as long-on runs in, well run
slower ball, full outside off, Yousuf waits on it and squeezes it through gully
straight delivery on off stump, driven back past the stumps down to long-on
tossed up on off stump, Malik drives back in the air between Botha's hand and Yousuf down to long-off
tossed up on middle and leg, swept out to Langeveldt at deep square leg
bang, thats six! Malik skips down the track and slams Botha, against the spin, rows back over wide long-on for his second dinger
flatter on leg stump, Malik flicks into the gap for one, raising the 50-run stand
flat outside off stump, steered to backward point
tossed up on middle and leg, on-driven into the gap for one more
slower ball, good length outside off, Yousuf comes forward and pushes into the covers for another easy single
full and wide, Malik cuts hard but de Villiers dives at point and saves runs
back of a length and he drops the hands, picking the gap between gully and backward point for a well-run two
maximum! Malik picks the slower one and comes down the track, connecting excellently on the lofted drive and sending it over long-off
good length outside off stump, flicked to midwicket
good length on off stump, slower one again, flicked towards mid-on
back of a length outside off stump, easily steered down to third man for one
short and wide, Yousuf gets over it and cuts into the ground and into the gap at gully for one out to the sweeper
bouncer over the stumps, Malik ducks under it and after a delayed thought Bowden signals wide
steered down to third man again by Malik, who's looking very good today
full outside off, Yousuf drives to Botha at short extra cover
slower ball, length on middle and off, turned to square leg for one more
overpitched outside off, Malik drives through cover and Smith dives at mid-off
tossed up on off, Yousuf flicks to de Villiers at midwicket
tossed up on middle and leg, turned wide of square leg for one
a fraction wide of off stump and Malik cuts out to deep backward point
flatter on middle and leg, helped around the corner for another single
flatter one on off stump, Malik exposes the stumps and just manages to get bat on it, chopping into the gap at point
tossed up on middle and leg, turned towards square leg and Yousuf calls for one as Gibbs runs around from short fine leg and fires in a throw
good length outside off, Yousuf comes forward and punches into the covers, then sends Malik back as two fielders converge, its lead by that man de Villiers
close shout! Straight delivery, pitching on middle and leg and angling down, catches Yousuf on the front leg as he falls over, looks a good shout but Asad Rauf isnt convinced
drifts down leg again and this time Yousuf nudges it away for one
short and wide, cut hard but de Villiers intercepts it brilliantly at backward point
fuller delivery outside off, Malik uses the feet and drives through the gap out to Kallis at deep cover
slower ball on a length, Yousuf shuffles across the stumps but cant beat the fielder at midwicket
six more! Malik again dances down the track and slams Botha back over his head for half a dozen, a clean, straight hit
flatter delivery, Malik uses the feet but isnt to the pitch and he defends it back
tossed up on off stump, Malik gets a good stride in and defends to point for one
tossed up on off, Yousuf reverse-sweeps but cant beat backward point
this one pitches and goes the other way, with some bounce, to square up Yousuf as he defends it ... the ball rolls into the gap and Malik calls for one
tossed up on off, he looks to cut but hits it back into the ground
back of a length outside off, he gets back and defends it down the track
back of a length again, this time Yousuf pushes straight to cover
good length on off stump, played off the front foot to point and he calls for the sharp single, just making his crease
and he moves to 49 with an uppish flick into the gap at midwicket
back of a length on off, Yousuf defends back towards the stumps and falls over, Boucher whips off the bails but Yousuf's back leg is in
chopped into the ground in front of point and Yousuf isnt happy with himself
tossed up outside off, he defends it back to Botha
there's his half-century as he tucks it from middle and leg into the gap for one
tossed up on off, Yousuf flicks to de Villiers at midwicket
flighted again on middle and off, Yousuf falls forward as he tries to work it away
quicker delivery on middle and off, Yousuf defends it
gives it some air and Yousuf squeezes it into the gap at cover for one
flicked uppishly from middle and off past a diving Gibbs at midwicket for two
comes onto the front foot and gets beaten as he tries to drive Pollock
good length on off stump, Yousuf shuffles and places it into the gap at midwicket for another easy single
good length on off, Malik makes room and steers it to de Villiers at point
short delivery just outside off, Malik makes room again and steers it wide of Boucher and down to third man
thats four after a while! Yousuf gets up and uses the extra pace from Pollock to glide it off the face of the bat and third man cant get to it in time
good length just outside off stump, driven back to the bowler
bouncer, Malik thinks about playing off the front foot but then takes evasive action, swirving out of the way
short outside off, Malik pulls into the ground in front of midwicket
back of a length on off, Malik makes room and steers it down to third man
slower ball outside off, Yousuf waits and guides it to third man, who's been kept busy all day, no matter who the fielder on duty down there
good length delivery, driven off the outside-edge to third man for one
good length delivery outside off, Malik comes onto the front foot and defends to cover
almost a yorker on middle and leg, which Malik drives back down the ground into Pollock's boot, and the ball rolls away for a single to mid-off
good length on middle and leg, Yousuf brings up the 100 partnership with a single through midwicket ... well done
a bit of room outside off, Malik gets over it and cuts out to wide third man
slower ball outside off, Yousuf comes out and steers it through the gap behind square and calls for two as third man moves around
overpitched outside off, Yousuf plants the front leg out and drives out to deep cover to end the over with a single
good length on middle and off, Yousuf just taps that to square leg and calls for the one, which Malik responds well to
very full outside off, Malik squeezes it into the covers
back of a length on middle and off, tucked to backward point and Yousuf sends Malik back as de Villiers descends in quickly
slower ball on middle and leg, Yousuf rolls the wrists and picks up another to square leg

short ball does the trick! Langeveldt pitches short and Malik swivels on the pull, uneasily, getting it high on the bat and finding Kemp at deep mid-on, taking it as he falls backward, for a well-made 56
good length on off stump, he gets behind the line and defends it back
slower ball outside off, he comes forward and tries to defend but the ball bobs up in front of square leg, Misbah calls for the quick single
short and wide and rising, Misbah gets over it and cuts but de Villiers is too smooth running forward from point
short outside off, Misbah pulls into the ground and through the gap at square leg for the single out to the sweeper fielder

good length outside off, driven into the covers, a bit of yes-no-maybe-so but in the end the batsmen cross for the single ... Yousuf just seems to be confusing his  partners from time to time with his indecisive calling
bit of room outside off, he cuts but de Villiers throws himself around and saves runs
back of a length outside off, Misbah gets up and dabs it into the ground
tossed up outside off stump, wide, Yousuf reverse-sweeps and picks up two down to third man as Pollock gives chase
flatter outside off, comes in a touch as Yousuf makes room to cut but ends up chopping into the ground
again Yousuf hits into the ground and is mad with himself ... good bowling
tossed up on middle and leg, turned into the gap for one
straighter one, middle and off, Misbah tries to play it fine but cant beat square leg
tossed up again, now he drives and picks the gap at midwicket
straying onto leg stump and its worked off the pads for a brace by Misbah
overpitched outside off stump, Misbah drives to extra cover
slower ball from Morkel, pitching on leg and moving down, Misbah gets an inside-edge back onto his pads
good bowling this from Morkel, keeping it straight on middle and off, Misbah falls over in his shot, unable to work the ball away
thats a poor ball, straying onto leg stump and Misbah flicks well through the gap behind square leg and the ball races away for four
back of a length, cramping him for room, Misbah chops it to backward point
tossed up on a length, Yousuf backs away to leg and allows the ball to come in, then pushes into the covers for one
tossed up fuller, slower delivery, on middle and off and Misbah defends
big strike! Misbah clears the front leg and creams the tossed up delivery over deep midwicket for six, just a clean slog-sweep
flatter and quicker down leg, Misbah cant connect with his pull and Smith at short fine leg dives to save certain runs
tossed up on middle and leg, Yousuf gets forward and sweeps for one
he sizes it up and goes for the slog again, hitting it well over midwicket and mid-on for a one-bounce four
slants down leg stump, Yousuf cant connect with his pull but the ball clips his pad and runs down to the fine leg boundary
slips down leg stump for a wide this time ... Kallis cant find his radar
good length just outside off, Yousuf opens the face and runs it to third man, moving to 90 from 121 deliveries
straight on the stumps, played back towards Kallis by Misbah
back of a length, Misbah shuffles to outside off and steers it to third man
slower ball outside off, Yousuf comes forward and lazily drives to Botha in the covers
good length on middle and off, worked to Pollock at mid-on for one
back of a length outside off, he waits and pushes into the gap at point for two
back of a length again, Yousuf gets up on the toes and placing it into that same gap, the ball speeds across the turf and Pollock is slow to get there from third man
third back-of-a-length ball and Misbah drops it into the covers for a single
slower ball, a touch fuller, Yousuf mistimes it to backward point, declines the single but de Villiers fires in a throw to Ntini, who doesnt collect it well and allows a single
full delivery, Misbah makes room and tries to clear extra cover, but connects only with the tip of the bat to spoon a simple catch to Smith, moving around from mid-off
pushed to point, theres further hesitation between the batsmen as de Villiers fields but they wisely decide against running
good length outside off stump, pushed into the point region for one
fullish ball on middle and off, turned uppishly but safely to midwicket
thats outta here! Afridi doesnt waste time, slogging Kallis from outside off and over deep midwicket! Huge hit!

great catch under pressure! Afridi slogs Kallis up into the air again, mistiming it miles up in the air above square leg, Langeveldt watches it perfectly as it spirals and swirls above him, initially over-running it at deep square leg but then backtracking well to get his hands on it and hold a beauty!
full outside off stump, Yousuf comes across and drives to midwicket
good length outside off stump, Yousuf gets on top of it and square-drives well into  the gap behind point to raise his 13th ODI century ... the crowd cheer their appreciation for a watchful innings
full outside off, Tanvir swings across the line but cant connect
good length on leg stump, he looks to play across the pads but gets a leg-bye to point, bringing Yousuf back on strike
slower ball, fuller on off stump, pushed uppishly back past Ntini to mid-off
fullish on leg stump, Tanvir slogs it over midwicket and the sweeper fields
overpitched well wide of off stump, Yousuf kneels down and square-drives to point
back of a length on middle and leg, turned off the pads to square leg for one
good ball, good shot! Morkel bowls a near-perfect yorker on off but Yousuf gets down on bended knee and opens the face, running it superbly down to third man
full on middle and off, driven towards mid-on for a single

short ball on the stumps, Tanvir swings across the line blindly and takes the ball smack on his chest, Yousuf calls for the leg-bye and Tanvir is hopelessly short of his crease but Morkel, who had all the time, misses the stumps
back of a length, worked to the fielder on the off
too full down the legs, wide called as Yousuf misses out
slower, shorter ball again slides down the leg stump and Yousuf is quick to turn and paddle it past short fine leg for four, top shot
overpitched outside off, Yousuf drives straight to cover for a quick single
attempted yorker on leg stump, driven into the covers for one more
short outside off, Tanvir swings it over Langeveldt's head for one to long-on ... Pakistan's 250 is up with that audacious stroke
too full outside off, Yousuf tries to steer it away but chops into the ground in front Boucher
slower ball, Yousuf stands his ground and pushes it to point, he seems in no mood to accelerate matters
good length outside off, Tanvir slogs it into the ground and Yousuf calls for it
full toss on leg stump, mistimed slog out to deep midwicket
full in the zone, Yousuf can only drive back to Morkel, who fields
bowled 'em! A somewhat tired-looking Yousuf swings at one on the stumps, misses as he swivels, and the ball knocks back leg stump
short ball down leg stump, Rehman hops and turns it into the gap behind square leg, runs the first hard and comes back for the second as a good throw nearly has him

slower ball outside off stump, Morkel rolling his fingers across the seam, Rehman goes for a big biff over the infield but ends up spiralling it up into the air for Gibbs to take a good catch running back from mid-off
another slow ball outside off, Tanvir chases it but cant connect
another wide delivery, Tanvir slogs but cannot make contact
oh Rao! A first-baller for the tail-ender, who doesnt move his feet as he drives lustily at a simple, straight delivery and his off stump goes for a walk
full delivery, straight on the stumps, Gul on-drives to mid-on
wide delivery, well outside off stump and Tanvir leaves it be
full in the slot, Tanvir slogs it back down to mid-off for one
bouncer over leg stump, Gul tries to get his head out of the way but it clips his helmet
what a shot! Langeveldt's attempted yorker goes awry, down leg stump, and in a flash Gul connects with a sublime flat-batted pull over deep square leg
overpitched outside off, Gul drives into the covers for a single as Pakistan make 265 for 9

inn2.comm: back of a length a touch wide of off stump, Smith leaves it alone

cleaned up - off a NO-BALL! Gul oversteps by a big margin and gets the ball to sneak back between Smith's defenses but it doesnt count! Smith left a gap between bat and pad and the ball came through to hit the stumps ... but it wont count
slower ball, almost a yorker but outside off stump, Smith mistimes his slog along the ground down to mid-on for one

first ball, and its not a no-ball this time! Gul traps Gibbs with one that pitched outside off and came in to strike him on the crease, plumb in front of middle and leg, excellent delivery coming off the seam
back of a length on middle and leg, Kallis goes back in front of the stumps and tucks the ball to square leg
back of a length outside off stump, Jallis judges it and shoulders arms
quicker delivery, lifting off a short length outside off and Kallis leaves be
back of a length down leg stump, there's a bit of a noise as Smith goes for the flick but Billy Bowden signals wide ... Akmal isnt happy
much straighter delivery, on the stumps, Smith gets right behind the line and defends it watchfully back to Tanvir
gives him room and he chops it through gully for a single to third man
lovely seam position, the ball pitching on a length and squaring up Kallis, angling right across him as he feels for it and gets beaten ... a wry smile from Kallis

taken! Tanvir bowls one fuller across Kallis, again angling it away and Kallis initially plays but then tries to leave, the ball kisses the outside edge as the bat twirls in his hands and flies to Younis at second slip, who takes a low catch ... Pakistan on fire here!
back of a length on  leg stump, de Villiers shuffles and works it off the pads through square leg for three ... and its another no-ball so one more free hit
short on the stumps, Smith swivels and pulls over square leg out to the fielder, on the bounce, for a single
slower ball, full on off stump, de Villiers drives into the covers
what a ball, pitching on a length and beating Smith's angled bat as he plays across the stumps, then it seams over the top of middle and leg
good length outside off stump, Smith comes forward tentatively and defends
a touch fuller, Smith hustles forward and pushes to Malik at mid-on for one
bouncer sails down leg stump and Asad Rauf signals wide
overpitched outside off and de Villiers drives well but to cover
overpitched again, a touch slower, but de Villiers uses the feet well and punches into the covers again ... no chance of a run, however
back of a length outside off, de Villiers gets the front leg forward and shoulders arms as the ball seams in for Akmal to collect
good length, pitching and coming in and Smith dead-bats it back to Tanvir
fuller, moving in again from off, Smith on-drives to midwicket hesitantly
Smith comes down and Tanvir bowls it back of a length, well wide of off stump
good length outside off, Smith rolls his wrists and flicks it towards Yousuf at midwicket, sprinting down for one
too full outside leg stump and de Villiers doesnt let it go, flicking well into the gap behind square leg and the outfield takes care of the rest
back of a length, angled across him at a good height and de Villiers leaves
back of a length outside off, left alone again by de Villiers
good length, pitching on middle and seaming away to off, Smith gets across and wristily works it into the midwicket area for three
good length on off stump, de Villiers gets forward and defends to point
slower ball, back of a length, de Villiers comes forward and leaves it be
again he gets the front leg out and then shoulders arms to a good-length ball
slower ball stays low outside off as de Villiers gets onto one leg and attempts to swat it away over square leg, he's beaten on the stroke
shot! de Villiers leans down and threads the off-side gap with an elegant square-drive for four ... poor ball to end a good over from Gul
Smith walks out of his crease towards point and Tanvir bowls short, then the left-hander dabs it into the covers
short on off stump, Smith pulls into the ground and through the gap at short fine leg for one out into the deep
full delivery pushed across de Villiers, who gets a good stride in and leaves
back of a length, de Villiers quickly pushes off the back foot to cover
overpitched on middle and leg, de Villiers on-drives to Malik at mid-on
back of a length, pitching outside off and coming in, de Villiers gets behind the line and drives to extra cover
good length outside off stump, he hurriedly dabs it into the covers and calls for one, de Villiers responds well
good length outside off stump, he comes forward and shoulders arms
fullish outside off, de Villiers drives to Malik at short extra cover, whose reflexes are sharp there
poor ball, too slow and very wide outside off stump
full and wide again and de Villiers square-drives streakily through gully, Misbah runs around from third man and fields on the boundary, firing in a good throw
too short outside off stump and de Villiers latches on superbly, pulling through midwicket with excellent timing for four
slower ball outside off, he comes forward and nudges it down to third man
good length on middle and leg, moving away, but de Villiers gets behind it and drives  into the midwicket region for one
full outside off stump, Smith falls forward and steers it towards point for one
full outside off, going away, de Villiers drives hard but cant beat point
too much width outside off stump and de Villiers gets into position, coming across and square-cutting hard for four
good length ball, change of pace, de Villiers gets forward and checks the drive to mid-off
back of a length on middle and off, he shuffles and works it to midwicket
good length outside off, comes in sharply and de Villiers just manages to get bat onto it, running it to backward point
good length again, this time de Villiers watchfully defends it
straighter ball on middle and off, wobbly seam, de Villiers turns it towards square leg and Smith urges the single
overpitched on leg stump, Smith tries to flick but gets a leading-edge through extra cover for two
good length on off stump, Smith defends back to Gul
back of a length on off stump, Smith dangerously shuffles across and whips it through midwicket, the balls speeding away and Malik gives up the chase
a bit of room outside off, de Villiers cuts hard but cant beat backward point
slower ball, stays low as it jags back close to off stump, and de Villiers dangerously decides to leave it be
quicker ball, straight on off stump, driven back to Tanvir, who fields one-handed
too full on middle and leg and de Villiers flicks through midwicket, Yousuf giving chase and hauling it in on the boundary, batsmen run three
good length outside off stump, Smith moves really forward and defends
full and moving, Smith gets forward and turns the bat in his hands, rolling the ball to midwicket
starts off too straight on leg stump and de Villiers tucks it fine for one
back of a length on off stump, worked straight to midwicket by Smith
back of a length again on off stump, Smith shuffles and works it acting-captain Younis at mid-on, who safely fields but then throws onto the stump and allows free runs
dropped! Smith drives a full delivery to Gul in the covers, who gets his hands in front of his face and allows the ball to pop in and out over his head
back of a length outside off stump, steered down to third man
extra pace and bounce from a charged-up Rao, who bangs it in short outside off, Smith gets up and tries to uppercut but misses out
good length outside off, de Villiers comes forward and defends to point
oversteps, de Villiers steers the ball from outside off to third man for one
slow low full toss outside leg, Smith clobbers it over midwicket out to the deep
short and wide, cut into the covers where Younis fields

another drop! de Villiers flicks a ball from middle and off into the air and Rehman mistimes his jump from midwicket, getting his left hand to it but failing to pluck it .... poor fielding from Pakistan
straighter ball on off stump, driven to mid-off
good length on off stump, driven down the ground and the bowler fields
back of a length marginally outside off, de Villiers takes it high on the bat and the ball drops near his off stump
back of a length on middle and leg, flicked out to Hameed at deep square
bit of room allows Smith to twirl it through gully for one as third man fields
tight line, no room, back of a length on off and de Villiers defends it
quicker delivery, back of a length, de Villiers takes one hand off the bat as he drives from his crease and gets an inside-edge onto his pads
good bowling from Rao, not offering any room and de Villiers defends it back
shuffles across off stump and flicks it through midwicket for four
full outside off, Smith reaches for it and drives straight to Yousuf at mid-off
again he shuffles across off stump but tucks it to the fielder at midwicket
full and wide, Smith reaches out and drives to Afridi in the covers
fullish length, Smith drives it sweetly but cant beat Afridi in the covers
back of a length, Smith moves outside off stump and drives to mid-on for a sharp single
slower ball, pitching on a length outside off stump and Smith defends it
room outside off, Smith chops it towards backward point where Nazir moves to his right, collects and shies at the stumps, but misses ... good fielding though
straighter delivery, flicked out to deep midwicket for a couple
back of a length outside off, worked to Misbah at midwicket
dropped! Short outside off stump, worked across the line to midwicket where Misbah dives to his left but cant hold on .... what fielding today from Pakistan ... and its four to boot!
short and wide and Smith crunches it through the covers to rub salt in Pakistan's wound
full and flat down leg stump, flicked to square leg for a single
quick and flat, pitches on leg and spins into Smith, who defends to midwicket
flighted up on off stump, flicked towards square leg for one
tossed up on a length, de Villiers comes forward and defends it back
full and flat on leg, de Villiers uses the feet and drives it to mid-on
flighted up on middle and leg, Smith flicks it off the front foot to midwicket
slow ball, back of a length on off stump and de Villiers can only defend
back of a length again on off stump, nudged to square leg, no chance of a run

bowled 'em! de Villiers tries to go over mid-on, standing and swinging across the line one-handed, but misses the ball's trajectory completely and hears the death rattle as the middle and leg stumps are splayed! Rao loves it!
short outside off stump, Kemp gets up and then leaves it be
good length outside off, Kemp inches forward and then leaves it be
yorker-length ball on leg stump, Kemp gets forward and defends it off the toe end of the bat to end a wicket-maiden from Rao, well bowled
tossed up on middle and off, Smith gets forward and defends it to cover
tossed up on middle and off again, he works it towards square leg
flighted on leg stump, Kemp gets across and plays at it, the ball does too much drift down and the umpire declines Afridi's appeal
again flighted down leg stump and Kemp flicks it fine for two
tossed up on middle and off, Kemp plods forward to defend
flat down leg stump, Kemp turns it to Younis at midwicket
back of a length outside off stump, poked to backward point
slower ball, the off-cutter beating Smith as he pokes outside off stump, it dribbles to Akmal behind the stumps
good length just outside off stump, stays low and Smith defends it back
another slower ball, Smith feels for it and steers it well wide of Nazir at backward point and picks up one to third man
full and straight, hint of swing into the pads as Kemp comes forward and defends
good length marginally outside off stump, defended hesitantly to point
tossed up outside off stump, pushed towards point and Smith sends back Kemp
tossed up outside off again, Smith drives and gets beaten as the ball spins across him
flatter on middle and off, tucked straight to midwicket
back of a length on middle and off, he shuffles and works it to midwicket
quicker one outside off, he steers it to Hameed in the covers for a sharp single
flighted up outside off, the ball dips into Kemp as he plays coming forward
bouncer on middle and leg, surprises Smith but he does well to pull into the ground behind square leg for one
back of a length, Kemp drives to Hameed in the covers
fuller delivery outside off, Kemp drives loosely and gets an inside-edge which flies along the ground to Akmal, who does well to dive to his left and stop it
back of a length outside off, steered wide of Nazir at backward point for one
full and straight on off stump, hint of movement, driven back to Rao
short of a length outside off, Kemp gets back and punches it through the covers and gets two as deep cover moves around to field
tossed up full on middle and off, Smith inside-edges the flick into the gap at short fine leg and Nazir gives chase, keeping it to just a single
drifts down leg stump, he flicks it but cant beat Yousuf at short fine leg
full down leg again, this time he beats Yousuf and gets two out to the deep
quicker delivery, pitches on leg and goes down as Kemp defends, hit low but Bowden reckons it was doing too much as Afridi appeals
full on middle and leg, driven to mid-on for one

another drop! Would you believe it? Smith comes forward then back and chips a simple catch back to Afridi, who cups his hands in front of his face and spills a dolly! This is very poor from Pakistan tonight ... I've lost count of the drops

good length outside off, pitches and comes in to catch Kemp on the front pad as he pushes forward with a good stride, getting struck marginally outside the line of off stump... Rao and Akmal appeal and after a long thought Asad Rauf raises the finger of fate
overpitched outside off stump, swinging in, Boucher punches straight down the ground, mid-on dives and parries the ball away but the batsmen dont run a second
slower ball, back of a length outside off, Smith steers it down to third man and runs hard for the second
back of a length outside off, Smith pokes at it tentatively and gets an inside-edge back towards short fine leg
good length outside off, pushed to cover
back of a length on middle and leg, tucked to midwicket for one
fullish, on the middle and leg, turned behind square leg for a single
slower in the air, nicely looped up, Smith leans forward and is beaten by the change of pace and is struck on the pad
on the middle and leg, Smith works it to midwicket for a single
lands on the off stump line, turns slightly, patted to backward point
slower, fuller, outside off, Boucher is sucked into the drive but is late into it and gets a inside edge
appeal for lbw as a slider on the middle and leg beats the prod to strike the pad. It was probably going down leg though
bouncer, 133 kmph, and Smith was too early into his pull shot and was hit on the mid-riff... It was a tennis-ball like bounce
on the off stump line, defended to cover
slightly short in length, outside off stump, mistimes a cut to backward point
on a length, around middle and off and Smith bottom-hands a push drive towards mid-on
off cutter in the zone outside off, Boucher shoulders arms
another off cutter, slowish, turned to the on side for a quick single
slow legbreak on the off stump line, pushed to cover
slider on the middle, turned past midwicket for a single
loops up one outside leg stump and Smith is quick to latch on to it and easily helps it along to the fine leg boundary. And that's his fifty. 30th ODI fifty.
leans forward to defend a delivery around off stump
googly that turns sharply from outside leg stump, Smith lunges at it, can't make contact and the ball strikes him on the pad
slower, turning in from outside off, Smith pushes at it, outside the line and gets a inside edge to the leg side
tossed up outside off, steered to backward point
tossed up again, he drives it to mid-off
spins sharply down leg stump from middle and off, wide called
tossed up outside off, spins across him and he pushes to point
tossed up outside off, he gets down and sweeps but cant connect
again he sweeps and this time gets bat on it for one
tossed up on off stump, he gets forward and defends
tossed up on off, Smith works it to midwicket where Younis misfields
short and very wide, cut to Younis who dives and again misfields
tossed up on middle and off, driven down to long-on for one
flighted outside leg stump, flicked away towards square leg for one more
tossed up on middle and leg, on-driven into the gap for one
short and wide outside off, cut into the covers for one
tossed up outside leg, Boucher pushes towards midwicket and sends Smith back
comes down the track, Rehman bowls it quicker, and Boucher drives to midwicket
a bit wide outside off and it steered to short third man
tossed up on middle and leg, Boucher uses his feet and drives for one
pitches on off and spins down sharply to leg, wide is the call
short and wide, cracked out to Gul at deep backward point
tossed up on middle and off, spins away and Boucher plays it late and into the ground in front of point
flat outside off, Smith gets down and sweep out to deep midwicket
short and flat, Boucher pushes into the covers for one more
flat outside off, spins in and Smith drives back to Afridi
flighted up on off stump, worked across the crease to midwicket
poor ball, flat and spinning down leg stump, Boucher pulls past Yousuf at short fine leg and thats into the gap for four
at last someone holds onto something! Afridi flights it up, sucking Boucher forward and the ball bobs back to him for Afridi to hold a low and flat catch to his left, inches off the ground
tossed up outside off, spins into Smith and he tucks it to square leg
flat on leg stump, Pollock flicks out to Yousuf at mid-on
tossed up on a length, he defends and the ball pops up to leg for a run
quicker ball outside off stump, mistimed steer past Akmal
comes out of his crease and pushes a flat delivery to point
flatter one, pitches on leg and Pollock goes back to work it to midwicket
tossed up on middle and off, Smith shuffles and works it to short fine leg
short and flat, lands on middle and off and spins away, Pollock gets back and turns it into the midwicket area
flighted outside off stump, Smith kneels down and sweeps across the line out to Tanvir at deep midwicket for one
quicker one, flipper, Pollock comes forward and takes it with the inside-edge
full outside off, stays very low and beats Pollock as he cuts from the crease
tossed up on middle and leg, Pollock  gets a good stride in and defends
tossed up outside off, spins in and Smith mistimes the stroke to leg
again he sweeps and connects better, its in the air over square leg but safe
tossed up outside off, Pollock drives into the covers but cant find a run
tossed up again, he comes forward and drives patiently
spins away outside off, cut into the covers for one
quicker one outside off stump, Smith misses out on the flick, Rehman appeals but Asad Rauf knew it was outside the line of impact
flat on leg stump, tucked to Misbah at midwicket
short and wide, spins away and Pollock cuts into the covers for one
tossed up on leg stump, Smith sweeps uppishly and safely in front of deep backward square leg
drifts down leg stump for a wide
good shot! Pollock plants his foot out and creams a tossed up delivery up and over extra cover for four
tossed up on off stump, he comes forward and defends watchfully
pitches on off stump and spins in, catching Pollock on the pad with a thick inside-edge
tossed up on middle and leg, spins down and Smith misses with the flick
edged and gone! Rehman invites, with a fraction of room, Smith gets back and cuts and the thinnest of under-edges is well snapped up by Akmal!
tossed up outside off, Morkel gets forward and pushes to point
flatter one outside off, Morkel now  gets back and drives to Rehman
tossed up on off, he gets back and across and plays it back to Rehman
gives it a lot of air outside off, Morkel drives hard but gets an inside-edge down towards short fine leg
full and wide, Pollock drives hard and slashes it down to third man where Butt moves well and does the fielding
full on middle and leg, turned through midwicket for two
slow bouncer outside leg stump, Morkel ducks and a wide is signalled
back of a length on the stumps, driven back to Gul
back of a length outside off stump, Morkel is cramped for room and ends up chopping into the ground off the back foot
timing and placement! Morkel collects a half-volley on the pads and clips it into the gap for four
excellent shot! Gul pitches on a length outside off stump and Morkel hardly moves, just timing it on the up through mid-off for another boundary
tossed up on leg stump, spins down and Rehman appeals as the ball hits Pollocks pad
flat and short, Pollock gets back in his crease and drives through the covers
tossed up outside off, spins into Morkel and he pushes into the covers
good hit! Pollock uses his feet, skipping down and collecting it nicely, with a free swing of the arms, and getting six over long-off
sharp grip and turn as Rehman responds with a beauty that pitches on leg and spins past off stump to beat Pollock
and he's almost squared up this time as he fends for one spinning from leg stump
short and wide, Morkel cuts through cover-point for one
short outside off stump, Pollock pulls well over mid-on for four
short on off stump now and Pollock flat-bats it over midwicket for one
back of a length outside off, pushed to Nazir at backward point

cracked off the back foot past a diving extra cover, they take the first run lazily as mid-off swoops in, collecting and firing in a good, flat throw to Akmal as Morkel turns and dives to make his ground ... tv replays show he's just made his crease
slower ball from around the stumps, Morkel chases it and gets beaten
flat down leg stump, Pollock tries to tuck it fine but doesnt time it well
again drifting down leg stump, this time he places it into the gap for one
flat on off stump, worked to midwicket
big hit! Morkel reprises his Twenty20 efforts with an effortless slog-sweep to a slower googly, slamming it rows back over wide long-on
dropped! Rehman fires it onto leg stump, Morkel heaves it away and Misbah makes a mess of it at deep backward square leg, failing to judge it and letting it fall in front of him as he dives forward
quicker delivery outside off, he plays at it and it runs towards point
full outside off stump, Pollock pushes towards point for one
too full on leg stump and Morkel picks it up over midwicket, all power
short outside off, pulled hard through to Misbah at mid-on for one
back of a length outside off, Pollock cramped for room and cuts to point
slower ball outside off, no bounce at all as it dribbles past Pollock, who misses out on the cut due to the lack of carry
speared down leg stump, Pollock misses out on the flick as he advances
bad ball, down leg stump, a free run for South Africa
flighted down leg stump again, beating Akmal and Morkel
quicker one on middle and off, Morkel comes forward and defends
another flat ball down leg stump, wide called once more
now he oversteps, Morkel cant work it away past point off the back foot
tossed up on the stumps, Morkel goes for the slog but mistimes it up in the air over mid-on and it drops safely
flat on off stump, Pollock pushes it towards backward point
flat on off stump, Morkel gets back and pushes to the off and Rehman fields
flat again, faster one on off stump, played back towards Rehman's left side
tossed up on leg stump, tucked to midwicket for a single
good length ball comes in from outside off, Morkel gets forward and pushes to point
full toss outside off stump, drilled out to deep cover by Pollock, just two
full and wide, Pollock drives it through point once again
low full toss outside off, chopped to Nazir at point who lets it through his legs for one
full outside off, Pollock drives to Gul in the covers, who collects and fires a good throw to Akmal that catches Morkel short of his crease ... the crowd loves it!
full down leg stump, beats Botha but Akmal does well, diving to his left and saving runs
full and wide, he swings the bat at it and misses, Bowden signals wide ... Tanvir is not impressed
full on off stump, driven back to Tanvir to end the over
tossed up outside leg stump, Pollock works it through midwicket for two
tossed up full and wide, Pollock cuts and misses
tossed up on leg again, Pollock tucks into the gap for a single
tossed up on leg stump, ball spins down as Botha gets across his stumps and sweeps ... Rehman appeals as the batsman steal one
tossed up full, driven out to mid-on, who is deep
slower delivery on leg stump, the flight does it for Pollock as he fails to work it away
full on off stump, flicked out to midwicket
back of a length outside off stump, slashed to backward point ... dot ball
slower ball outside off, Pollock doesnt pick it and steers to Nazir again
drifts onto leg stump, Pollock flicks uppishly past a diving midwicket and runs hard
full down leg stump, clips the boot as Pollock looks to flick
full on middle and leg, clipped out to deep midwicket
tossed up outside leg stump, worked off the pads for a single
tossed up outside off, Botha sweeps across the line and wants two immediately
flatter ball on middle and off, Botha goes back and turns to midwicket
tossed up on off stump, Pollock shuffles and cant work it away as Rehman fields
gives it air outside off, Pollock waits and steers it to Malik at point
full outside off, Botha reverse-sweeps and the ball pops up well wide of Akmal
cleaned up! Gul bowls it full down leg, Pollock moves away to go inside-out, but ends up playing-on off the inside-edge onto leg stump and Gul pumps his fists!
short ball down leg stump, but Langeveldt backs away and tries to swipe it, missing all ends up and the ball sails past
full on leg stump, flicked out to deep midwicket for one
cheeky! Full down leg stump and Botha paddles it up and over the vacant fine leg region for four ... excellent improvisation
short on middle and leg, he tries the pull and gets it off the forearm, the ball rolls past Akmal
full outside off, he makes room to drive through cover but inside-edges to leg for a a quick single
full on leg stump, makes room and pushes into the covers for an easy single

and then there were nine! Banged in short, Botha turns in one smooth motion and pulls but finds Tanvir stationed out at deep midwicket, who juggles the catch and manages to hold on ... was timed very well but Botha picked out the man placed for this same shot
slower ball, full on middle and leg, clipped over midwicket for four
full outside off stump, driven uppishly to mid-off
full on leg stump, he makes room and ends up playing back to Rao
good length on middle and leg, Ntini works it to midwicket and scampers one
full just outside off, Langeveldt exposes the stumps and steers it to point
good length on off stump, Ntini gets bat on it and pushes back to Gul
overpitched outside off, he gives himself room and drives to cover
full on leg stump, Ntini drives and gets an inside-edge to point, Langeveldt calls for the single and gets it
slower ball sliding down leg stump, Langeveldt backs away and then defends to point for a sharp single... well bowled, well played
bouncer over the stumps, Langeveldt ducks under it as a wide is called for height
short and wide, Langeveldt pulls it well over mid-on, one bounce and four
full on off stump, he comes forward and drives nicely to mid-off, who is back
full again, Ntini uses his feet and drives, the ball hits the nonstrikers' stumps and the batsmen scamper one off the ricochet
full in the slot, gives himself room and drills it straight, long-off fields
another full ball in the zone, he drives and gets an inside-edge to point
full and wide, Langeveldt backs away and drives, mistiming it back to Rao
full past leg stump, inswinging yorker ... how did that miss? Ntini made room and swiped at it but made no contact
full on off, Ntini drives down to long-off for one
last man down and Pakistan win by 25 runs! Langeveldt makes room and scoops it up in the air, Tanvir in the deep runs in and holds an easy catch at mid-off
